mapper.insert: INSERT INTO raffle_setting (raffleSettingName, raffleType, storeName, country, delivery, payType, specialCase, content, releasePrice, imgSrc, insertDateTime) VALUES (#{raffleSettingName}, #{raffleType}, #{storeName}, #{country}, #{delivery}, #{payType}, #{specialCase}, #{content}, #{releasePrice}, #{imgSrc}, now())

INSERT INTO raffle(specialCase, url, productId, raffleType, releasePrice, imgSrc, storeName, country, delivery, payType, startDate, startTime, endDate, endTime, content, model_kr) VALUES (#{specialCase}, #{url}, #{productId}, #{raffleType}, #{releasePrice}, #{imgSrc}, #{storeName}, #{country}, #{delivery}, #{payType}, #{startDate}, #{startTime}, #{endDate}, #{endTime}, #{content}, #{model_kr})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM raffle_setting WHERE UPPER(replace(raffleSettingName,' ','')) = UPPER(replace(#{keyword},' ','')) ORDER BY insertDateTime DESC
